description: Confidential meeting authorizes Sven to recommend a crisis communication strategy addressing the data coin phenomenon, with options for either containment or guided amplification.
Sven discreetly signals trusted tech contacts to circulate platform instructions on how to access the vanished citizens’ network across key districts.
New waves of data coins appear in dense neighborhoods, sparking public excitement and allowing the vanished to coordinate aid and guidance, dividing loyalties citywide.
